title: Robot Line Follower
description: A Line Follower Robot is an autonomous vehicle that detect and follows a black or white path using Infrared (IR) sensors. The sensors, typically composed of IR LEDs and photodiodes, measure surface reflectivity to distinguish the line from the floor. A microcontroller processes this data and controls the motor driver to adjust wheel speed/direction, ensuring accurate path tracking.

title: Smart Plan and Lamp IoT Based
description: Smart plants integrate various systems and technologies such as the Internet of Things (IoT), smart sensors, big data analytics, artificial intelligence, and advanced communication systems to improve efficiency, safety, and productivity in the factory environment.
